body_html:
This is because SummaryWriter is no longer exported into the train module, as it was deprecated, but now FileWriter uses the same interface (see here)

Use tf.summary.FileWriter instead.
body_text:
This is because SummaryWriter is no longer exported into the train module, as it was deprecated, but now FileWriter uses the same interface (see here)
Use tf.summary.FileWriter instead.
body:
This is because SummaryWriter is no longer exported into the train module, as it was deprecated, but now FileWriter uses the same interface (see [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/34df7ee6f5a8f931d2433dc7e6e739bc880a35ea/tensorflow/python/training/summary_io.py#L31))

Use tf.summary.FileWriter instead.
